PrecisAuthority to sign a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT to amend the Lease between the Crown and the GREATER TORONTO AIRPORTS AUTHORITY by excluding the cost of policing and security services from airport revenues used to calculate the rent payable in respect of Lester B. Pearson International Airport.
